name: Animal Fall and Dinosaurs
description:
*** Animal Fall ***

Pop the Balloons before they race down to the floor.

* Balloons speed up as the level goes on
* Try to get a high-score
* Features a great musical soundtrack



*** Dinosaurs for Kids ***

Listen using the built-in speakers or headphones

The Mighty Dinosaurs
How a Dinosaur Was Buried in the Rock
How the Dinosaur Was Taken from the Rock
Despots of the Seas
Flying Reptiles
The Little-Brained Dinoceras
Titanotheres and Others
Mammoths and Mastodons
Some South American Rulers
